vclaim: Sen. Chuck Schumer is on record saying, "Candidates with deeply held Christian beliefs are unfit and disqualified from serving as a federal judge."
title: Did Chuck Schumer Say Judicial Nominees with ‘Deeply Held Christian Beliefs’ Are Unfit to Serve?
subtitle: The misquote appears to have originated with Schumer's comments during the confirmation hearing for one of George W. Bush's federal court appointments.
author: David Emery
